\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{\varinjlim _{\beta < \delta }(X_0)^\delta} \&\& A \& {(X_0)^\delta} \&\& {A^\delta} \\
	\\
	{\varinjlim_{\beta < \delta } X_\beta} \&\&\& {X_{<\delta}}
	\arrow["m", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{\varinjlim_{\beta < \delta} f_{\beta, 0}}"', from=1-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{(m)^\delta}", from=1-4, to=1-6]
	\arrow["{(f_{-, 0})}"', from=1-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{s_\delta}"', from=3-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{s_-}"', from=3-4, to=1-6]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
